Author: Foggypastel
Text: What do you use to browse Reddit? Can you get an adblocker? (I like "Ublock origin" on chrome if you're on a computer). I also use "brave" web browser app on my phone and it blocks ads.   I know it's low-key shitty blocking ads for sites, but if y'all didn't show me triggering stuff maybe I'd ignore it better~ I am constantly playing wackamole on Instagram trying to suppress triggering ads.
